Newcastle Scalable Computing

Scalable Group Seminars

This website documents the seminar series of the Scalable Computing research group at Newcastle University.

If you wish to participate, please contact Matt Forshaw or raise a Pull Request on Github here.

Upcomiong Seminars

Date Title Speaker
November 20, 2017 Preserving the currency of genomics outcomes over time through selective re-computation: techniques, initial findings, and open challenges Dr Paolo Missier and Dr Jacek Cala
